Question: On New Year's Eve 1955, they signed a new contract which required this person to make four films over a seven-year period.
Hints: This person received the 1961 Golden Globe Award as "World Film Favorite" in March 1962, five months before her death.
This person had three marriages, all of which ended in divorce.
He later hosted a birthday party for her, but the evening ended with a public quarrel, and this person left the party without him.
